description: Cut personal income taxes by reducing the lowest tax bracket from 15% to 12.75%
quote: Today I'm announcing that Canada First Conservatives will cut income taxes by 15% for the average worker or $2,000 for the average couple. This is a tax cut for seniors who are drawing their pension or retirement income. They will pay on average 15% less. This is a tax cut for the workers behind me who will pay 15% less on their income tax. This is a tax cut for the waitress, for the welder, for the barber. This is a tax cut for everybody who has ever got up early in the morning and work hard to build our country. This is a tax cut that will put Canada first. We will do it by reducing the lowest bracket from 15 to 12.75, which is a 2.25 percentage point reduction and that works out to a 15 percentage reduction in the overall tax bill of everyone earning up to $57,000.

transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre veut accélérer le développement de projets énergétiques – 20 mars 2025

description: Set a goal of approving all federal permits for the Ring of Fire mineral deposit within six months if elected.
quote: I'm announcing today that my government will set a target of approving all federal permits for the Cirque du Feu in northern Ontario within 6 months for the exploitation of chromite cobalt nickel copper and platinum.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Commit $1 billion over three years to help build a highway to the Ring of Fire area.
quote: We are also committing to providing $1 billion over 3 years to support the construction of a long-awaited road it will connect First Nations communities and the judgments of essential minerals of the Ring of Fire to Canada's highway network in Ontario.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Repeal Bill C-69 to facilitate resource development projects.
quote: We will repeal bill c69 the liberal law that prevents all projects from moving forward we will support mines pipelines factories natural gas plants more ports and wonderful opportunities for our natural resources.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Eliminate all carbon taxes.
quote: We will eliminate all carbon taxes.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Eliminate the GST on new homes to stimulate more construction.
quote: We will eliminate the GST on new homes to stimulate more construction made with products made here but also for its workers.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Toughen laws to put criminals in jail and protect communities.
quote: We will toughen the laws to put criminals in jail and protect our communities.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Appoint a minister responsible for official languages.
quote: Yes I will appoint a minister responsible for official languages.
transcript_title: Pierre Poilievre vows action on Ring of Fire, hits back at President Trump – March 19, 2025

description: Repeal the entire carbon pricing system, including the federal backstop for industrial emissions.
quote: Today I'm am announcing that a common sense Canada first conservative government will repeal the entire carbon tax including the federal backtop that requires provinces impose industrial taxes.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: No federal obligation for provinces to impose carbon taxes.
quote: Instead provinces will continue to have the freedom to to address this issue how they like but there will be no federal obligation to impose the tax.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Use technology instead of taxes to fight climate change and protect the environment.
quote: Instead of taxes we will use technology technology not taxes is the best way to fight climate change and protect our environment.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Expand eligibility for clean technology and clean manufacturing investment tax credits.
quote: We will expand ibility for the clean technology and clean manufacturing investment tax credits.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Lower income tax and investment tax, and axe the sales tax on new homes.
quote: This plan will lower income tax investment tax we will ask the sales tax on new homes to save you up to 50 Grand on the purchase of a new house.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Repeal C-69 to approve LNG plants, pipelines, mines, and port expansions.
quote: So why don't we repeal c69 the no new pipelines law rapidly approve l&g plants pipelines mines Port expansions.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025

description: Focus on technology, not taxes, to address emissions and bring home production.
quote: We have to focus on technology and not taxes first and foremost we have to take back control of our economy.
transcript_title: Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre vows to scrap entire carbon pricing system – March 17, 2025
